## ConfirmationDialogDirective class

Directive that enables confirmation dialog on click

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ConfirmationDialogDirective 
```

|  [confirm](./common-material.confirmationdialogdirective.confirm.md) |  | EventEmitter&lt;void&gt; | Occurs when user confirms confirmation |
